member.name: T:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.JsonToCsMsBuildTask
member.summary: Class responsible for generating partial class for TypedJSON

member.name: T:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.JsonToTypedJsonCsMsBuildTask
member.summary: Task for MsBuild responsible for generating partial class for TypedJSON.

member.name: P:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.JsonToTypedJsonCsMsBuildTask.InputFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the input files.

member.name: P:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.JsonToTypedJsonCsMsBuildTask.OutputFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the output files.

member.name: M:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.JsonToTypedJsonCsMsBuildTask.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.GetTypedJsonCSharpCodegenVersionTask
member.summary: Task for MsBuild that reads the versionnumber of the csharp codegenerator and returns it as output.

member.name: M:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.GetTypedJsonCSharpCodegenVersionTask.Execute
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Starcounter.Internal.MsBuild.JsonToTypedJsonCsMsBuildTaskNoLocking
member.summary: Task for MsBuild responsible for generating partial class for TypedJSON. Executed without loading into domain (slower).

member.summary: Gets or sets the input files.

member.summary: Gets or sets the output files.

member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the task.
member.returns: true if the task successfully executed; otherwise, false.
